title: eXistenZ
review: This is nuts. It's so much like The Matrix, and was released so shortly before, that it appears to have been completely forgotten in the shadow of the better film. It has some big ideas and I enjoyed it a lot. They are some terrible accents, and a funny justification of them later. They have a lot of fun with the spine holes. Completely unpredictable and dreamlike in places, and a classic videogame movie written by someone who has no idea what a videogame is.
